name: Fly Like A Bird 3
description:
Ever dreamed of flying? 

 Now you can (please don't jump out the window).

Fly like a bird allows you to do all the things a real bird would do;
- flying (of course),
- finding food,
- building a nest,
- laying eggs and
- raising chicks.

It comes with a variety of species and environments to choose from
and both singleplayer and multiplayer mode.

We were permitted by Gamevial to do this upload. :)

For further information, read this: http://www.raven-woods.com/Guidelines.pdf

<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>
 The following is just for developers who'd like to build on the FLAB3-Engine. 
If you just want to *play* the game, please click on "Download Now" instead!
<><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><><>

You can find the unity project here: Source

The file is password protected. In order to get the password, use the contact form on www.raven-woods.de or contact "Kouga" on Discord.
